subject: RE: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
msgSnippet: You are correct.  Thanks for the reminder. -Jason
messageBody:
You are correct. Thanks for the reminder.

-Jason

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Johannes Link [mailto:john.link@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 25, 2001 6:21 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in
> a test suite
>
>
>
>
> Jason Rogers wrote:
> >
> > Setup will always be called before every test method.
> If there is
> > information that you want initialized OAOO, you can put
> it in your
> > constructor.
> >
> > -Jason
>
> The constructor is called once per testMethod, since each
> test method
> results in one instance of the TestCase subclass at hand.
>
> Johannes
